CustomField.formula: IF( ISNULL ( Form_1634__r.If_yes_select_all_that_apply_1__c ), 0, IF( ( INCLUDES ( Form_1634__r.If_yes_select_all_that_apply_1__c, "Neurological condition - (ALS)" ) || INCLUDES ( Form_1634__r.If_yes_select_all_that_apply_1__c, "Neurological condition - Dementia" ) || INCLUDES ( Form_1634__r.If_yes_select_all_that_apply_1__c, "Neurological condition - (M.S)" ) || INCLUDES ( Form_1634__r.If_yes_select_all_that_apply_1__c, "Neurological condition - Parkinson's Disease" ) || INCLUDES ( Form_1634__r.If_yes_select_all_that_apply_1__c, "Neurological condition - Other" ) || INCLUDES ( Form_1634__r.If_yes_select_all_that_apply_1__c, "I - Neurological condition - multiple sclerosis" ) || INCLUDES ( Form_1634__r.If_yes_select_all_that_apply_1__c, "J - Neurological condition - amyotrophic lateral sclerosis" ) || INCLUDES ( Form_1634__r.If_yes_select_all_that_apply_1__c, "K - Neurological condition - other" ) ),1,2 ) )
